attributes.action: make charlie the face of the new £50 note

u cant tell me this is strupid this is a humen right and i hav the right to petetion

attributes.background: hi my name is charlie im aged 16 i do alot for society i feed the homeless and so on, i am a tory and i love theresa may, i do not oppose this government so that gives me all the more reason to be the face of the new £50 note i think i should have this opportunity because i am amazing and beautiful

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
